title: Trailer Hitch Install: CURT 15302 on Chevrolet Silverado 2500HD
description:
This video depicts the installation of the CURT 15302 class, Xtra Duty trailer hitch on a 2008 Chevrolet Silverado 2500HD.

Install Sheet - 
https://www.curtmfg.com/masterlibrary/15302/installsheet/CM_15302_INS.PDF

Application Coverage:
2001 - 2010 Chevrolet Silverado 2500, 3500, 6' bed
2001 - 2010 GMC Sierra 2500, 3500, 6' bed

Special Notes:
***DO NOT EXCEED VEHICLE MANUFACTURER'S RECOMMENDED TOWING CAPACITY***
PERIODICALLY CHECK THIS RECEIVER HITCH TO ENSURE THAT ALL FASTENERS
ARE TIGHT AND THAT ALL STRUCTURAL COMPONENTS ARE SOUND.
*** USE EXISTING VEHICLE HARDWARE ***

Warning:
-This video is intended to be used as reference. Please refer to print instructions for complete installation information.
tags: CURT Receiver Hitch, trailer hitch, towing, how to install, Chevy Silverado, GMS Sierra, curt 15302
